languages.text: "А уж под топкой крематория так вообще тепло! Жгут там кого-то редко, а прогревают часто, ну а нам что, нам хорошо... конечно, иногда через вентиляцию пахнет как будто жаркое готовят — аж слюнки текут! Но что поделать... издержки!"

"And it sure is warm under the crematorium's furnace! They barely burn anyone up there, but they do fire it up often enough — and that's good for us... sure, sometimes an odd smell makes it through the vents, like they're making roast — makes yer mouth water! But what can you do... that's the cost of comfort for ya!"
languages.original_text: "А уж под топкой крематория так вообще тепло! Жгут там кого-то редко, а прогревают часто, ну а нам что, нам хорошо... конечно, иногда через вентиляцию пахнет как будто жаркое готовят — аж слюнки текут! Но что поделать... издержки!"

But what can you do... that's the cost of comfort for ya!"

They barely burn anyone up there, but they do fire it up often enough — and that's good for us... sure, sometimes an odd smell makes it through the vents, like they're making roast — makes yer mouth water! But what can you do... that's the cost of comfort for ya!"

languages.text: “火葬场的炉子下面肯定很暖和！他们上面几乎从来不怎么烧尸体，但他们确实会经常点火，我们倒是住得挺舒服的……当然，有时候通风孔里会冒出古怪的味道，就像是在烤肉一样，馋得你都要流口水了！可你还能怎么办呢……想过得舒服，就得付出这样的代价！”
languages.original_text: "And it sure is warm under the crematorium's furnace! They barely burn anyone up there, but they do fire it up often enough — and that's good for us... sure, sometimes an odd smell makes it through the vents, like they're making roast — makes yer mouth water! But what can you do... that's the cost of comfort for ya!"

traits.locale_text: “火葬场的炉子下面肯定很暖和！他们上面几乎从来不怎么烧尸体，但他们确实会经常点火，我们倒是住得挺舒服的……当然，有时候通风孔里会冒出古怪的味道，就像是在烤肉一样，馋得你都要流口水了！可你还能怎么办呢……想过得舒服，就得付出这样的代价！”

languages.text: «¡Y aquí bajo el horno del crematorio hace mucho calor! No queman a casi nadie, pero lo encienden con regularidad, y eso nos viene de maravilla... Sí, a veces llega un olor raro por los conductos, como si estuvieran asando algo... ¡se le hace a uno la boca agua! Pero qué le vamos a hacer... ¡es el precio de la comodidad!».
languages.original_text: "And it sure is warm under the crematorium's furnace! They barely burn anyone up there, but they do fire it up often enough — and that's good for us... sure, sometimes an odd smell makes it through the vents, like they're making roast — makes yer mouth water! But what can you do... that's the cost of comfort for ya!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y aquí bajo el horno del crematorio hace mucho calor! No queman a casi nadie, pero lo encienden con regularidad, y eso nos viene de maravilla... Sí, a veces llega un olor raro por los conductos, como si estuvieran asando algo... ¡se le hace a uno la boca agua! Pero qué le vamos a hacer... ¡es el precio de la comodidad!».

languages.text: 「火葬場の炉の真下は暖かいもんですよ！ほとんど誰も燃やさないみたいですが、たまに火をつけるだけで我々には十分です…たまに焼き料理を作っているような変な臭いが換気口から漂ってきて、腹が減りますがね！でも…快適に暮らせるなら、どうってことないです！」
languages.original_text: "And it sure is warm under the crematorium's furnace! They barely burn anyone up there, but they do fire it up often enough — and that's good for us... sure, sometimes an odd smell makes it through the vents, like they're making roast — makes yer mouth water! But what can you do... that's the cost of comfort for ya!"

traits.locale_text: 「火葬場の炉の真下は暖かいもんですよ！ほとんど誰も燃やさないみたいですが、たまに火をつけるだけで我々には十分です…たまに焼き料理を作っているような変な臭いが換気口から漂ってきて、腹が減りますがね！でも…快適に暮らせるなら、どうってことないです！」

languages.text: "Und unter dem Ofen des Krematoriums ist es richtig warm! Verbrannt wird da oben kaum jemand, aber sie heizen häufiger ein – und das ist gut für uns ... sicher, manchmal dringt der Geruch durch die Lüfter, als würden sie grillen – da läuft einem das Wasser im Mund zusammen! Aber was soll's ... das ist eben der Preis für Bequemlichkeit!"
languages.original_text: "And it sure is warm under the crematorium's furnace! They barely burn anyone up there, but they do fire it up often enough — and that's good for us... sure, sometimes an odd smell makes it through the vents, like they're making roast — makes yer mouth water! But what can you do... that's the cost of comfort for ya!"

traits.locale_text: "Und unter dem Ofen des Krematoriums ist es richtig warm! Verbrannt wird da oben kaum jemand, aber sie heizen häufiger ein – und das ist gut für uns ... sicher, manchmal dringt der Geruch durch die Lüfter, als würden sie grillen – da läuft einem das Wasser im Mund zusammen! Aber was soll's ... das ist eben der Preis für Bequemlichkeit!"

languages.text: « Surtout sous le four du crématorium ! C'est pas souvent qu'ils y brûlent quelqu'un, mais quand ça arrive, c'est tout bénef pour nous... Alors oui, des fois, on sent une drôle d'odeur de barbaque grillée dans les conduits de ventilation et ça nous met l'eau à la bouche ! Mais que voulez-vous, c'est ça, le prix du confort ! »
languages.original_text: "And it sure is warm under the crematorium's furnace! They barely burn anyone up there, but they do fire it up often enough — and that's good for us... sure, sometimes an odd smell makes it through the vents, like they're making roast — makes yer mouth water! But what can you do... that's the cost of comfort for ya!"

traits.locale_text: « Surtout sous le four du crématorium ! C'est pas souvent qu'ils y brûlent quelqu'un, mais quand ça arrive, c'est tout bénef pour nous... Alors oui, des fois, on sent une drôle d'odeur de barbaque grillée dans les conduits de ventilation et ça nous met l'eau à la bouche ! Mais que voulez-vous, c'est ça, le prix du confort ! »

languages.text: "Ee krematoryum fırınının altı sıcak olacak tabii! Nadiren birini yaksalar da sık sık fırını harlarlar. O da bize yarar. Arada havalandırma deliklerinden tuhaf kokular gelir, sanki bir şey kızartır gibi yani. İnsanın ağzı sulanıyor! Fakat ne yapacaksın işte, konforun da bir bedeli var!"
languages.original_text: "And it sure is warm under the crematorium's furnace! They barely burn anyone up there, but they do fire it up often enough — and that's good for us... sure, sometimes an odd smell makes it through the vents, like they're making roast — makes yer mouth water! But what can you do... that's the cost of comfort for ya!"

traits.locale_text: "Krematoryum fırınının altında sıcak olacak tabii! Nadiren birini yakıyorlar ama yaktıkları ateş bize yetiyor. Bazen havalandırma deliklerinden tuhaf kokular geliyor, sanki mangal yapıyorlarmış gibi oluyor. İnsanın ağzı sulanıyor! Fakat yapacak bir şey yok, konforun da bir bedeli var!"
